languages.text: "Слуги вечно волокут сюда всякий хлам, который мне ни к чему. Поищи дубину или острую палку под стать своим способностям. Впрочем, можешь использовать и более продвинутые технологии... Если не боишься убить ими себя сам{mf|ого|у}".

"The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."
languages.original_text: "Слуги вечно волокут сюда всякий хлам, который мне ни к чему. Поищи дубину или острую палку под стать своим способностям. Впрочем, можешь использовать и более продвинутые технологии... Если не боишься убить ими себя сам{mf|ого|у}".

traits.locale_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Les serviteurs stockent ici toute la camelote qu'ils trouvent. Tout cela ne me sert à rien. Vous devriez y trouver une masse ou une pique adaptée à vos compétences. Ou vous pourriez choisir quelque chose de plus perfectionné... Enfin, si vous n'avez pas peur de vous tuer avec par mégarde. »
languages.original_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: « Les serviteurs stockent ici toute la camelote qu'ils trouvent. Tout cela ne me sert à rien. Vous devriez y trouver une masse ou une pique adaptée à vos compétences. Ou vous pourriez choisir quelque chose de plus perfectionné... Enfin, si vous n'avez pas peur de vous tuer avec par mégarde. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “那些仆人总是把不值钱的破烂玩意儿拖过来。我用不着这些东西，你自己找根适合你的棒子或者尖棍子吧。当然，你也可以试试更高级的东西……只要你不怕一不小心把自己弄死就好。”
languages.original_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: “那些仆人总是把不值钱的破烂玩意儿拖过来。我用不着这些东西，你自己找根适合你的棒子或者尖棍子吧。当然，你也可以试试更高级的东西……只要你不怕一不小心把自己弄死就好。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Die Diener schleppen ständig wertlosen Schund her. Ich habe keine Verwendung dafür. Sucht Euch eine Keule oder einen scharfen Stock, der zu Euren Fähigkeiten passt. Ihr könntet auch etwas Komplexeres versuchen ... falls Ihr keine Sorge habt, Euch damit versehentlich selbst zu töten."
languages.original_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: "Die Diener schleppen ständig wertlosen Schund her. Ich habe keine Verwendung dafür. Sucht Euch eine Keule oder einen scharfen Stock, der zu Euren Fähigkeiten passt. Ihr könntet auch etwas Komplexeres versuchen ... falls Ihr keine Sorge habt, Euch damit versehentlich selbst zu töten."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Los sirvientes siempre me traen baratijas sin valor alguno. No las necesito. Busca un garrote o un palo afilado que se adapte a tus habilidades. Bueno, si no tienes miedo de morir accidentalmente usándolo... podrías probar con algo más avanzado».
languages.original_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: «Los sirvientes siempre me traen baratijas sin valor alguno. No las necesito. Busca un garrote o un palo afilado que se adapte a tus habilidades. Bueno, si no tienes miedo de morir accidentalmente usándolo... podrías probar con algo más avanzado».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「従者たちは、いつも価値のない小物をここに引きずり込む。私には役に立たぬものばかりだ。自分の能力に合った棍棒か鋭い棒を見つけるんだ。もっと高度なものを試してみてもいいだろう。それで誤って自らを殺してしまうことを恐れないのであればの話だが…」
languages.original_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: 「従者たちは、いつも価値のない小物をここに引きずり込む。私には役に立たぬものばかりだ。自分の能力に合った棍棒か鋭い棒を見つけるんだ。もっと高度なものを試してみてもいいだろう。それで誤って自らを殺してしまうことを恐れないのであればの話だが…」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Hizmetkârlar, buraya hep önemsiz ıvır zıvırlar getirir. Onlara ihtiyacım yok. Kendine, kabiliyetlerine uyacak bir sopa veya sivri bir değnek falan bulabilirsin. Kendini kazayla öldürmekten korkmuyorsan daha gelişmiş bir şey de arayabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "The servants are always dragging worthless trifles in here. I have no use for them. Find yourself a club or a sharp stick suited to your abilities. You could try something more advanced... assuming you are not afraid of accidentally killing yourself with it."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlar buraya hep önemsiz ıvır zıvırlar getirir. Onlara ihtiyacım yok. Kendine, kabiliyetlerine uyacak bir sopa veya sivri bir değnek falan bulabilirsin. Daha gelişmiş bir şey de deneyebilirsin. Tabii kendini kazayla öldürmekten korkmadığını varsayarsak."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
